attributes.action: A11 Thetford to Barton Mills - Central reservation barrier
attributes.additional_details: We the under signed request that the central reservation barrier type being employed on the A11 between, Thetford and Barton Mills be replaced with a design that does not present such a high risk to Motorcyclist and Scooterists. The steel wire barrier has more uprights plus no prevention for motorcyclists and Scooterists to slide underneath, or through during and incident causing more devastating injuries.
